item.title: Nehru used Korean war as an excuse for inflation, says PM Modi in Lok Sabha
Cong crossed all limits during pandemic, says PM: Top quotes
Trump took Kim 'love letters,' govt records from WH: Report
‘I am a free bird': Owaisi again refuses Centre’s Z security
Why Kim keeps aiming his missiles at this 'most hated rock'
item.description: Alsom Island, located 18 kilometers (11 miles) off North Korea’s northeastern coast, has been targeted in more than 25 missile strikes since 2019. It was the destination of eight rockets in January alone, as Kim carried out the most launches since he took power.

item.title: Live: Major states see big dip in daily Covid numbers
item.description: India reports 83,876 new Covid cases, 895 deaths in last 24 hours. The recovery rate in the country currently stands at 96.19%. The unprecedented surge in cases in the third wave is now being followed by a record fall. In the second week of declining infections, cases dipped by a record 45% with the rate of fall more than doubling from 19% in the previous week. Stay with TOI for the latest updates:

item.title: New feed, video call & other features coming to Instagram
IT firms worry about 'moonlighting' during WFH
item.description: Dealing with moonlighters in these times of remote work is posing a challenge for IT firms. Many tech professionals with full-time day-jobs are said to be working on side projects. Companies worry that this is causing revenue and productivity losses.

item.title: Google Chrome gets this big change after 8 years
Punjabi actress Sonam Bajwa is ruling social media
How Google uses AI to make search better for you
There’s not much for people to remember me: Rakul Preet
5 times Shah Rukh Khan was targetted by hate-mongers
item.description: 5 times Shah Rukh Khan was targetted by hate-mongers

item.title: IPL Auction: RCB may bid handsomely for Jason Holder
item.description: Former West Indies captain and one of world's premier all-rounders Jason Holder could well turn out to be one of the most expensive buys at this edition of Indian Premier League's mega-auction with Royal Challengers Bangalore expected to bid heavily for him.

item.title: Amitabh remembers Lata Mangeshkar with her throwback video
item.description: The death of legendary singer Lata Mangeshkar has left a vacuum that can never be filled. People across the country have been grieving since she breathed her last on Sunday morning.

item.title: IPL 2022: Who will captain which team?
item.description: They say that a captain is as good as his team; but it is also true that a true leader can rally an enthusiastic bunch to do great things. From Shane Warne to MS Dhoni to Rohit Sharma -- captains have played a major role in the success of teams in the world's most competitive T20 league - the Indian Premier League.

item.title: Live: Amit Shah to release BJP manifesto for UP on Feb 8
item.description: Stay updated with the Times of India to get all the live updates of Assembly Election News, Manifestos, Candidates List and Nomination Dates-

item.title: BCCI-NCA may have '19 plus' team
item.description: Kamal Passi played a few matches for Punjab some seasons ago, Ravikant Singh is nowhere near the system now and four years since his glory days, Manjot Kalra's career hasn't got a head-start.
